00108                 // The vector of the camera movement in the current frame. This value is computed in
00109                 // handleEvent() and then later in updateFrameData(), the camera position is updated
00110                 // based on this.
00111                 vmml::Vector3f _moveDirection;
00112 
00113                 // Same as the camera viewing direction, only that the y component is always zero.
00114                 // Used in handleEvent() to calculate mMoveDirection.
00115                 vmml::Vector3f _cameraWalkingVector;
00116 
00117                 // The differences of the mouse pointer position of this and the last frame, in pixels.
00118                 // Used to calculate the new viewing direction
00119                 int32_t _pointerXDiff;
00120                 int32_t _pointerYDiff;
00121 
00122                 // The current angles of the camera. The current camera viewing direction is calculated
00123                 // based on this.
00124                 float _cameraAngleHor;
00125                 float _cameraAngleVer;
00126 
00127                 // Distributed objects
00128                 InitData _initData;
00129                 
00130 
00131                 // Clock used to measure the amount of time the last frame took, to make it
00132                 // possible to have a framerate-independent rotation
00133                 eq::base::Clock _clock;
00134         };
